trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en kontroll som redigeringsprogrammet som gir sluttbrukerne mulighet til å redigere flere egenskaper for brukergrensesnitt (UI) på en tilknyttet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the behavior of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen BehaviorEditorPart er en kontroll som redigeringsprogrammet som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klasse, og brukes til å redigere egenskapene som påvirker hvordan en tilknyttet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone.
trans-unit.target: Bare som verktøyet orientert soner i webdeler kontrollen settet (for mer informasjon, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>klassen oversikt over) verktøyet orientert del kontroller (verktøydeler) og hver tool-delen må befinne seg i en bestemt type verktøyet sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Verktøyet delene i webdeler kontrollen settet har to spesiell egenskaper:-de er helper kontroller som brukes til sluttbrukerne mulighet til å tilpasse på en webdeler side.

trans-unit.source: - They are visible only in certain display modes.
trans-unit.target: -De er bare synlige i enkelte visningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen BehaviorEditorPart inngår verktøyet som vises bare når en webdeler-siden er i redigeringsmodus, og når en bestemt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen er valgt for redigering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: Som alle andre kontrollen BehaviorEditorPart <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontrollerer, finnes i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>sone kan bare inneholde <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontroller, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Kontroller kan ikke plasseres i en annen type sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The control is not displayed on the page under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen vises ikke på siden under visse betingelser.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property value on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>egenskapsverdi på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen redigeres er `true`, og siden er i bruker-område (som er standard), kontrollen ikke vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the BehaviorEditorPart control to be displayed in this scenario, typically you would need to follow two steps: - Add an entry to the Web.config file that gives an authorized user permission to edit Web pages in shared personalization scope (which means that the changes the user makes will be visible to all users of the application).
trans-unit.target: For BehaviorEditorPart-kontrollen skal vises i dette scenarioet vanligvis må du to fremgangsmåte:-Legg til en oppføring i Web.config-filen som gir en autorisert brukertillatelse til å redigere websider i delt område (som betyr at endringene brukeren gjør vil være synlig for alle brukere av programmet).

trans-unit.source: - Programmatically change the page from user-level to shared-level personalization scope at run time, for example by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Endre programmatisk siden fra bruker på radnivå til delt nivå område ved kjøretid, for eksempel ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to make the BehaviorEditorPart control visible in a page, see the Example section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på hvordan du gjør BehaviorEditorPart kontrollen vises i en side, kan du se eksempel i dette emnet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about shared controls and personalization scope, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om delt kontrollene og område [oversikt over webdeler personlige data](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart class also has an important method, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, which it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class and overrides.
trans-unit.target: Klassen BehaviorEditorPart også er en viktig metode <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, som arver fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klassen og overstyringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited and assigning them to the fields of the editing control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden er svært viktig fordi den gjør det mulig for henting av egenskapsverdiene fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollere redigeres og tilordner dem til feltene for kontroll for redigering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the BehaviorEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:behavioreditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller BehaviorEditorPart kontrollen skal brukes på sider utholdenhet av deklarerer en `<asp:behavioreditorpart>` element i en `<zonetemplate>` elementet som i sin tur inneholder en `<asp:editorzone>` element på en webside.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: BehaviorEditorPart-kontrollen kan sluttbrukerne mulighet til å redigere Brukergrensesnittet egenskaper for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A>til å redigere andre egenskaper og virkemåten for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroller, kan du bruke den andre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Kontroller angitt med webdeler kontrollen settet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette omfatter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Kontroller må gi de fleste redigering funksjonene som er nødvendig for å redigere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroller, men du kan også opprette en egendefinert redigeringsprogrammet-kontroll ved arving fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: For kodeeksempel en, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the BehaviorEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å forbedre tilgjengelighet, gjengis BehaviorEditorPart kontrollen i en `<fieldset>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the BehaviorEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: Den `<fieldset>` elementet grupperer relaterte settet med kontroller som brukes til å redigere i BehaviorEditorPart kontrollen, og den muliggjør følgende navigasjon blant kontrollene for både visual brukeragenter (for eksempel vanlig nettlesere) og tale orientert brukeragenter (for eksempel programvare).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengelighet markup gjengis som standard for denne kontrollen, kan ikke med kravene for tilgjengelighet standarder som Web innhold tilgjengelighet retningslinjene 1.0 (WCAG) prioritet 1 retningslinjene.

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om tilgjengelighet støtte for denne kontrollen, kan du se [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av klassen.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren BehaviorEditorPart er standard. Ingen konstruktør er deklarert i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>klassen, og derfor ikke spesielle oppgaver utføres når en ny forekomst av klassen opprettes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control to a page declaratively at design time.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis du trenger ikke å bruke konstruktøren, fordi du kan legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>kontroll på en side deklarativt under utformingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control programmatically for some reason, you can use the BehaviorEditorPart constructor.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis du skal legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>kontrollen programmatisk på grunn av noe du kan bruke BehaviorEditorPart-konstruktøren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer verdier fra en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"> </xref> kontrollen til de tilsvarende egenskapene i den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ApplyChanges er en kritisk metode på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Den metoden formålet er å lagre verdiene som en bruker er angitt for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>kontrollen til de tilsvarende egenskapene i den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den tilknyttede kontrollen det refereres til i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>kontrollen er arvet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set a number of user interface (UI)-related property values on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ApplyChanges prøver å angi et antall brukergrensesnittet (UI)-relatert egenskapsverdier for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a list of the property values that are set in this method, see the Remarks in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: En liste med verdier som er angitt i denne metoden, kan du se kommentarer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks an OK verb or an apply verb in the editing UI.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ApplyChanges kalles når brukeren klikker en OK verb eller et Bruk verb i redigering Brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis handlingen lagring verdier fra det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"> </xref> styre til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen er vellykket; ellers (Hvis det oppstår en feil), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when trying to set the value for a property on the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feilen under forsøk på å angi verdien for en egenskap for den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the default button on the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir IDen for standardknappen kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultButton property overrides the base property to set several attributes on the property.
trans-unit.target: DefaultButton-egenskapen overstyrer egenskapen base for å angi flere attributter for egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The property cannot be used with themes, and it cannot be browsed with a design-time user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen kan ikke brukes med oppsett, og den kan ikke blas gjennom med en utformingen-brukergrensesnittet (UI).

trans-unit.source: The value of the property is retrieved from the base property value.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen hentes fra base egenskapsverdien.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the default button.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder IDen til standard.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en kontroll skal vises når de tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The Display property returns a value of `true`, meaning that the control will be displayed, except in one case.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi for egenskapen Vis `true`, noe som betyr at kontrollen vises, unntatt i ett tilfelle.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property value on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>egenskapsverdi på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen redigeres er `true`, og siden er i bruker-område (som er standard), kontrollen ikke vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the steps required, and a code example that shows how to cause the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control to be displayed for editing, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> class overview and code example.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om de nødvendige trinnene, og et kodeeksempel som viser hvordan du kan føre til at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>kontrollen skal vises for redigering, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>klassen oversikt og koden eksempel.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set is designed with the assumption that shared controls--controls that are visible to all users--should be visible for editing only when a page is in shared personalization scope, meaning that the editing changes are visible to all users.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler kontrollen settet som er laget med forutsatt at delt Kontroller--kontroller som vises for alle brukere--som skal vises for redigering bare når en side i delt område, betyr at redigering endringer er synlig for alle brukere.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi som angir om kontrollen skal vises.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter egenskapsverdier fra en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollere og tilordner dem til det tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SyncChanges er en kritisk metode på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Den implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>metoden fra basisklassen, henter gjeldende verdier fra det tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollere og oppdateringer kontrollene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>kontroll med verdiene slik at en bruker kan redigeres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SyncChanges kalles når verdiene i den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen kan ha endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: For en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>kontroll, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>sone som inneholder kontrollen kaller SyncChanges-metoden, slik at verdiene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>kontrollen er alltid synkronisert med verdiene i den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en tittel for redigeringsprogrammet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien tittel vises i tittellinjen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>kontrollerer når kontrollen er synlig i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Når kontrollen er deklarert i en side, kan du angi en verdi for den `Title` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for tittelen, brukes en standardverdi for kulturen bestemte for beskrivelse av for egenskapene som kontrollen tillater at brukere redigerer.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som brukes som tittelen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en beregnet kontroll ble levert av webdeler kontrollen settet.
